AnalystsTest.Text:
5/28/2014 4:27:27 PM
Considering the present state of Indian economy, outline five key agendas for the newly formed Central Government. 


                                         Indian Economy
1. Eliminate corruption

2.  Pick out all block money from corrupted persons

3. Increase our rupee value

4. Formation of new government which will be ideal to all countries

5. increase sincerity, humanity in all works.

        The present economy of our country is very low when compared to other countries. Because last 5 years onwards all prices are increases like vegetables, petrol, diesel, gold because of our government due to  non perfection and negligence in work of all ministers. Some of them are corrupted in dealings of works. For ex: If we take mines corruption from collector to ministers are corrupted. But still the case is going on in the courts due to authorities from higher commands. The same case is if we see in abroad the case will be close with in a few months and give perfect punishments. This should take as a lesson from abroad countries to develop our country.

         All of them are saying India is developed country, India is developed country but it is not true still India is developing country why I am saying this is if India is a developed country we should not ask for change of government, we can continue the same government. Now we will require new government which will be not corrupted by any one,any thing and by any circumstances. then only our country will develop in all areas like GDP, interest rates that banks are giving to poor people.India will develop when all block money will come out from all corrupted persons. If this money will collect from corrupted persons that will become some billion crores of bulk amount that is useful for our country to develop.

      when we come to our rupee value it is gradually decreases  day by day, because all Indians are using foreign products instead of using local products. Because there is no promotion to our Indian products. If we take any toys and mobiles or anything  they had a tag line of made in China, South korea or any other country except the name of India. For example when we take our daily use tooth pastes Promise and babool are our Indian products but no one is using those products.So promotion is necessary for our products. For promotion we should require money, quality, correct measurements to all products, then only our rupee value is increases.

      All our intelligent delegates are going to abroad to work why not in our country due to lack of employment. We should not be in "Q" for taking Visa to go to other country all other countries should be in "Q" to take visa to come to our country. Then only our India will become developed country.
